edu.ucla.sspace.evaluation

Class ESLSynonymEvaluation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.evaluation.ESLSynonymEvaluation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WordChoiceEvaluation

    public class ESLSynonymEvaluation
extends Object
implements WordChoiceEvaluation
    A test of synonym questions gathered from the ESL (English as a Second Language) exam by Peter Turney. See Peter Turney's webpage on the test for full details on the test and how to get a copy of the questions.
    See Also:
    TOEFLSynonymEvaluation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ESLSynonymEvaluation(File eslQuestionsFile)
      Constructs this evaluation test using the ESL test question file.

      Constructs this evaluation test using the ESL test question file refered to by the provided name.
